Please, give us permission to access your storage to save your progress.
Hi! My score was %d! Can you bit me?

1. When you receive an SMS with the encrypted score on another device, copy that SMS's text.
2. Open on that device this app, go to main menu and click the button "Load score".
3. In the input on that device paste the copied SMS message.
4. That's it!
Please give us permission to read SMS.
